page.description: Displays the contact information of this user account

page.name: View Account Photo
page.description: Displays the photo associated with this user account

page.name: Add One Membership
page.description: To add one user group membership to your user account
page.comment: User accounts can be added one at a time

page.name: Add Multiple Memberships
page.description: To add multiple user group memberships to your user account
page.comment: If you enter a user group that is already a membership of this account, this user group will be ignored

page.name: Remove One Membership
page.description: To remove one user account membership from your user account
page.comment: User accounts can be removed one at a time

page.name: Remove Multiple Memberships
page.description: To remove multiple user group memberships from your user account
page.comment: If you enter a user group that is not already a membership of this account, this user group will be ignored

page.name: Add One Membership
page.description: To add one user group membership to this user account
page.comment: User accounts can be added one at a time

page.name: Add Multiple Memberships
page.description: To add multiple user group memberships to this user account
page.comment: If you enter a user group that is already a membership of this account, this user group will be ignored

page.name: Remove One Membership
page.description: To remove one user account membership from this user account
page.comment: User accounts can be removed one at a time

page.name: Remove Multiple Memberships
page.description: To remove multiple user group memberships from this user account
page.comment: If you enter a user group that is not already a membership of this account, this user group will be ignored

page.name: Add to Address Book
page.description: Adds this account to your address book

page.name: Send to Address Book
page.description: Sends this account to your address book

page.name: Search
page.description: To explore the content of this site

page.name: View Article
page.description: Displays the content of an article
page.comment: An article can is a combination of text, images and related content

page.name: Edit Related Content
page.description: To request the modification of one of the articles or images related to this article, or to reorganize them
page.comment: Only the editor of this article can reorganize this content

page.name: Remove Related Content
page.description: To request the removal of an article or image related to this article

page.name: Basic Search
page.description: To search the entire site by content type and by keyword

page.name: Add New Article
page.description: To request the addition of a new article related to this article

page.name: Add New Image
page.description: To request the addition of a new image related to this article
page.comment: Do not add if this image is already stored in this wiki

page.name: Add New Image
page.description: To request the addition of a new image related to this article
page.comment: Do not add if this image is already stored in this wiki

page.name: My Tools
page.description: To manage your account and associated tasks

page.name: Add Existing Content
page.description: To request the addition of an existing article or image related to this article
page.comment: You must have recently accessed this content to submit a request

page.name: Request
page.description: To view or edit a content request
page.comment: The approver and the initiator can edit a content request only if this request is pending approval. Reference requests and removal requests cannot be edited

page.name: Edit Article Content
page.description: To request the modification of this article or to remove versions of this article
page.comment: Only the editor of this article can remove one of its versions

page.name: Edit Image
page.description: To request the modification of this image
page.comment: To avoid the creation of duplicate image versions, please upload a new file ONLY IF the image itself has changed

page.name: Edit Image
page.description: To request the modification of this image
page.comment: To avoid the creation of duplicate image versions, please upload a new file ONLY IF the image itself has changed

page.name: View Article Version
page.description: Displays the historical content of an article

page.name: Site Map
page.description: Hierarchical list of all screens accessible to all users in this site
page.comment: Some screens may require authentication

page.name: Article Properties
page.description: Displays the properties of this article
page.comment: Statistics are generated on a daily basis

page.name: Advanced Search
page.description: To search the content of this site using advanced search criteria

page.name: Article Properties
page.description: Displays the properties of this article
page.comment: Statistics are generated on a daily basis

page.name: Image Properties
page.description: Displays the properties of this image
page.comment: Statistics are generated on a daily basis

page.name: Subscribe to Article
page.description: To request an email notification to be sent when a new version of this article is issued
page.comment: The recipients of this notification can be an individual user or the members of a group

page.name: Subscribe to Image
page.description: To request an email notification to be sent when a new version of this image is issued
page.comment: The recipients of this notification can be an individual user or the members of a group

page.name: Unsubscribe to Article
page.description: To stop email notifications from being sent when a new version of this article is issued

page.name: Unsubscribe to Image
page.description: To stop email notifications from being sent when a new version of this image is issued

page.name: My Approvals
page.description: Lists the content requests waiting for your approval

page.name: My Subscriptions
page.description: Lists the content you are subscribed to
page.comment: Subscriptions are articles or images from this site that you want to receive by email on a regular basis

page.name: Advanced Search
page.description: To search the content of this site using advanced search criteria

page.name: View Requests
page.description: Lists the content requests submitted by this user and waiting for approval
page.comment: Requests can be content to add, edit, or remove. Requests can also be references to add or remove

page.name: View Approvals
page.description: Lists the content requests waiting for approval by this user

page.name: View Subscriptions
page.description: Lists the content this user subscribed to
page.comment: Subscriptions are articles or images from this site that the user wants to receive by email on a regular basis

page.name: View Content
page.description: Lists the content this user is responsible for
page.comment: A user is responsible for an article if this user is its author. A user is responsible for all content of an article if this user is its editor

page.name: Add Access Group
page.description: To add a group to the list of access groups of this article
page.comment: The editors, the associate editors, the author and the subscribers of an article are always granted access

page.name: Remove Access Group
page.description: To remove a group from the list of access groups of this article
page.comment: The editors, the associate editors, the author and the subscribers of an article are always granted access

page.name: Add Access Group
page.description: To add a group to the list of access groups of this image
page.comment: The editors, the associate editors and the subscribers of an image are always granted access

page.name: Remove Access Group
page.description: To remove a group from the list of access groups of this image
page.comment: The editors, the associate editors and the subscribers of an image are always granted access

page.name: Add Access Group
page.description: To add a group to the list of access groups of this article
page.comment: The editors and the associate editors of an article are always granted access

page.name: Remove Access Group
page.description: To remove a group from the list of access groups of this article
page.comment: The editors and the associate editors of an article are always granted access

page.name: My Requests
page.description: Lists the content requests you have submitted and waiting for approval
page.comment: Requests can be content to add, edit or remove. Requests can also be references to add or remove

page.name: My Daily Digest
page.description: Lists the content you are subscribed to on a daily basis and that have been modified during a day

page.name: My Weekly Digest
page.description: Lists the content you are subscribed to on a weekly basis and that have been modified within a period of 7 days

page.name: Subscribe to Article
page.description: To request an email notification to be sent when an article or image is added or modified in this article
page.comment: The recipients of this notification can be an individual user or the members of a group

page.name: Unsubscribe to Article
page.description: To stop email notifications from being sent when an article or image is added or modified in this article

page.name: Online Help
page.description: To get help about this site by reading user documentation

page.name: Online Help
page.description: To get help about this site by reading user documentation

page.name: Remove One Member
page.description: To remove one user account from this user group
page.comment: User accounts can be removed one at a time

page.name: Remove Multiple Members
page.description: To remove multiple user accounts from this user group
page.comment: If you enter a user account that is not already a member of this group, this user account will be ignored

page.name: Add New Proxy
page.description: To grant your transaction privileges to another person
page.comment: A grantee cannot grant your transaction privileges to another person

page.name: Remove My Proxies
page.description: To revoke transaction privileges you have granted

page.name: Edit My Proxies
page.description: To modify an existing grant of your transaction privileges

page.name: References
page.description: To view and edit reference data used in this site

page.name: My Proxies
page.description: Lists the users you have granted transaction privileges to, and the users you can perform transactions for

page.name: View Proxies
page.description: Lists the accounts this user has granted transaction privileges to, and the accounts this user can perform transactions for

page.name: View Groups
page.description: Lists the groups this user account belongs to, and the groups this user account manages

page.name: My Groups
page.description: Lists the groups you belong to, and the groups you manage

page.name: Add New Group
page.description: To enter a new local user group
page.comment: Personal user groups are accessible to all users but they are not displayed by default in lookups

page.name: Edit My Groups
page.description: To modify a user group you own

page.name: My Content
page.description: Lists the content you are responsible for
page.comment: You are responsible for all content related to an article if you are its editor. You are responsible for an article if you are its author

page.name: View Article
page.description: Displays the content of an article
page.comment: An article can is a combination of text, images and related content
